name: Temtem Clothes Previewer
description:
Hi!

First of all, almost all of this previewer assets belongs to Crema Games game Temtem, and not mine at all. (Just the shader used on the materials is mine) 

BUT THIS TOOL IS NOT OFFICIAL, CREMA DOESNT CUT ANY CAKE HERE(I mean i can invite them if they want to eat some) , SO DO NOT ANNOY THEM BECAUSE OF THIS TOOL, annoy me ^^ 

This is a tool to preview all the cosmetics available in the game, being able to equip any available dye too. Just to make sure that dyes and cosmetics are of your liking before spending some pansuns on them ^^

There are cosmetics marked with a luma star, those are either obtained purchasing it them outside the game (Future BP, future Deluxe edition...), or either Kickstarter,Discord,PS ... rewards. Basically available ingame but not available to farm ingame. 

NOTE THAT THE ONES FOR DELUXE EDITION ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE UNTIL ITS RELEASE.

For any problem or not added cosmetic, leave it on the comment section below, or on the version devlog comments,  ill try to update as soon as i can ^^

Btw, you can rotate the character and planning to put a screen for the total cost of the fit or something like that.

Have a good day!
